remarks: Lemma for ~ dalaw .  Utility lemma that breaks ` ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ ( S .\/ T ) ) ` into a join of two pieces. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2012.)
statement:
dalawlem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dalawlem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dalawlem.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dalawlem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dalawlem2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( S e. A /\ T e. A ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ ( S .\/ T ) ) .<_ ( ( ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ T ) ./\ S ) .\/ ( ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ S ) ./\ T ) ) ) $.
